Subskills.name: Adrenaline Secretion
Subskills.description: Increases the projectile speed of blood bolts.

Subskills.name: Volume Increase
Subskills.description: Increases the size of blood bolts.

Subskills.name: Demon Sentry
Subskills.description: Summon a following blood demon unleashing blood bolts to nearby monsters with increased blood bolt amount and attack speed.

Subskills.name: Hemophilia
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict bleeding on hit.

Subskills.name: Demonic Formula
Subskills.description: Chance for blood bolts to become piercing and to continue traveling forward after hitting a monster.

Subskills.name: Leukocytes
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt by blood bolts.

Subskills.name: Advanced Metabolism
Subskills.description: Blood bolts start homing towards the nearest target briefly after being casted.

Subskills.name: Demon Master
Subskills.description: Increases the damage of blood demons spawned by blood bolts.

Subskills.name: Wave of Blood
Subskills.description: Unleash a wave of blood leaving a trail of blood behind it. Any player touching the trail gains increased movement speed, faster cast rate and increased arcane skill damage.

Subskills.name: High Hemoglobin
Subskills.description: Increases the amount of blood bolts.

Subskills.name: Arterial Blood
Subskills.description: Decreases the mana cost of blood bolts.

Subskills.name: Thrombus
Subskills.description: Chance on hit to knock enemies back with force dealing increased damage.

Subskills.name: Bloodshed
Subskills.description: Unleash a blood bolt towards each nearby monster draining your life for each target dealing increased damage.

Subskills.name: Mark of the Demon
Subskills.description: Conjure a pool of blood on target location. Unleash blood bolts towards monsters in the blood pool.
